articles.content: Decks are being cleared for the mega listing of Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC), Indias largest financial institution with assets of over Rs 32 lakh crore. The government is systematically … [+6446 chars]

articles.author: Karunjit Singh
articles.title: Explained: Why are petrol, diesel prices rising in India? - The Indian Express
articles.description: Petrol and Diesel price today: Retail prices of automobile fuels have reached record highs across the country. Petrol and diesel are taxed heavily in India, and oil price decontrol is a one-way street — the consumer never benefits.
articles.content: Diesel and petrol prices have hit record highs across the country, with petrol touching Rs 89 per litre in Delhi on Monday, and diesel reaching a new high of Rs 86.30 per litre in Mumbai.The governme… [+7103 chars]
